content:
For anyone who saw me HIMSS, you may recall I sprained my ankle. One neat thing to emerge from this: I now have data available in multiple patient portals, accessible via the SMART on FHIR API :-)

I figured I'd share a bit at https://github.com/jmandel/my-health-data/tree/master/my-data (and I'll aim to automate the process of doing a full fetch; for now this is just the result of a few API calls I issued by hand). There are FHIR payloads and some C-CDA documents (linked to from FHIR DocumentReferences).
